title: Parker Settecase on Evangelizing Trinitarianism
description:
Parker is a theology student at Trinity Evangelical Divinity School. He is the host of "Parker's Pensees" youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYbTRurpFP5q4TpDD_P2JDA

I ask him about his theological background. We talk about the importance of the doctrine of the trinity to salvation, how a church defines itself and he shares with me his argument for the Trinity based on our knowledge of concepts. We also discuss William Hasker, Paul Vanderklay, Jordan Peterson, Fred Sanders, Paul Gould, Chad McIntosh, Steven Nemish, John Vervaeke, Thomas Aquinas, Augustine and more.

00:00:00 - Introduction
00:29:30 - How to define a church
00:37:40 - Heresy and Salvation
01:00:00 - Parker's argument for the Trinity

Find these videos on podcast form here: https://anchor.fm/transfigured-sam
